section1.title: 1. Purpose of donorHub
section1.text:
donorHub is a cryptocurrency-driven donation platform designed to connect individuals with charitable causes worldwide. Our mission is to make giving easy, transparent, and rewarding by allowing donors to contribute and participate in prize pools.

Whether you're looking to support humanitarian projects, environmental conservation, education, or any other cause, donorHub ensures that your contributions are securely processed and reach their intended recipients. Prize pools are an added feature to incentivize donors, combining philanthropy with engagement.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility
section2.text1: To use donorHub, you must meet the following requirements:
section2.li1: You are at least 18 years old or the legal age of majority in your country.
section2.li2: You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the donation process.
section2.li3: You are not prohibited by law from making cryptocurrency transactions in your jurisdiction.
section2.text2: donorHub reserves the right to terminate accounts or restrict access if any eligibility criteria are violated.

section3.title: 3. User Accounts (if applicable)
section3.text1: If user accounts are available or introduced in the future, they will be subject to the following terms:
section3.li1: Choose a secure and unique password.
section3.li2: Keep your login credentials confidential and secure.
section3.li3: Ensure that all account information is current and accurate to avoid disruptions.
section3.text2: In case of unauthorized account access or suspicious activity, notify donorHub immediately. We will not be liable for any losses or damages caused by your failure to maintain account security.

section4.title: 4. Donations and Prize Pools
section4.text1: Donations made through donorHub are final, non-refundable, and processed through secure blockchain networks. Prize pools offer users the chance to win rewards, subject to the following conditions:
section4.li1: Each prize pool specifies entry requirements, deadlines, and rules.
section4.li2: Winners are selected fairly, either via blockchain mechanisms or secure randomizers.
section4.li3: Prize distribution may be subject to verification processes and adherence to the pool's terms.
section4.text2: By participating in prize pools, you acknowledge the inherent risks of cryptocurrency transactions, including fluctuations in value and transaction fees.

section5.title: 5. Cryptocurrency Transactions
section5.text1: All transactions on donorHub are processed on blockchain networks. This ensures security and transparency but may also lead to:
section5.li1: Irreversible transactions once confirmed on the blockchain.
section5.li2: Delays caused by network congestion or wallet errors.
section5.li3: Responsibility for inputting correct wallet addresses lies solely with the user.
section5.text2: donorHub is not liable for losses arising from user errors or network issues. Always double-check transaction details before proceeding.

section6.title: 6. User Responsibilities
section6.text1: Users must adhere to the following guidelines when using donorHub:
section6.li1: Refrain from illegal activities, including fraud, money laundering, or tax evasion.
section6.li2: Respect the intellectual property of others.
section6.li3: Avoid submitting harmful, misleading, or offensive content.
section6.text2: Violations may result in account suspension, legal action, or other consequences.

section7.title: 7. Data Privacy
section7.text: donorHub collects and processes your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Your data will never be sold or shared with third parties without consent unless required by law.

section8.title: 8. Liability Disclaimer
section8.text: donorHub provides services "as is" without guarantees. We disclaim all warranties, and our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

privacy.pageTitleText: Please read this carefully and act accordingly.
privacy.introText: At DonorHub, we value your privacy and are committed to safeguarding any information related to your use of our platform.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We do not collect any personal information from our users. All interactions on DonorHub are conducted anonymously and tied solely to Ethereum addresses.

useOfData.title: 2. Use of Data
useOfData.description: Any data collected is used strictly to improve platform functionality and ensure system security. This includes transaction details and usage analytics.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.description: DonorHub uses minimal cookies to enhance user experience. These cookies do not store personal information and are used only for performance optimization.

security.title: 4. Security
security.description: We prioritize security by employing industry-standard practices to protect all transactions and data interactions within our platform.

changes.title: 5. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our platform or compliance with legal requirements. Please review it regularly to stay informed.

privacy.footerText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
